A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I haven't read any reviews\, amateur or professional.
Just trying to form my own opinion of it.
And the further away from it I get the more I absolutely despise everything - almost everything.  Not quite everything not quite everyone. Most of it\, most of them.
Kylo's character development was rich\, dark\, surprising and terrifying.  It was most of the show.
Hux is ok...  The acting was bad.
Snoke... looks like Al Davis
Rose was annoying and too young. Too outspoken with corny proclamations and actually kissed a guy on the ground who was immobilized and clearly wasn't into her.  That kind of confidence in a girl who isn't a supermodel or a genius screams SHELTERED.
Every cgi creature was reliving the prequel nightmares.
The entire gambling planet was a wasted scene with kids straight off the set of Oliver Twist.
It was all boring and corny\, especially those little creatures.
Luke being a whiny crabby old bitch MADE NO SENSE.
Rei and Finn were good\, likable characters. But Pau was an idiot who should have been executed for mutiny and literally got the whole rebellion annihilated while disobeying his superiors.
Wealthy old liberals are admirals now.
Only Yoda's scene was flawless.
WHY DIDN'T THEY REALIZE THAT LITTLE GREMLIN DANCING IN POKER CHIPS WAS NOT FUNNY?
WHY was the casino a carbon copy of Monte Carlo?
Remember the hookah bar on Tatooine? With weird music\, dingy dark 
corners? Where was that inspiration?

Disgusted
